seo.title: web 3.0 Interest accounts up to 10.7% apy
seo.description: A groundbreaking offer. Stake USDT, USDC on the Choise.com DeFi platform and receive increased yield.

array.title: What coins can I open an interest account in?
What are the maximum and minimum deposit amounts?
array.description: The minimum deposit amount is $200 (in USDT/USDC equivalent). The is no maximum amount.

array.title: What currency will I receive the interest in?
array.description: The interest will be calculated in the currency of the deposit.

array.title: Is there a lock period?
array.description: No, there is no lock period for the coins at the end of the deposit term.

array.title: When is the interest paid?
array.description: Once at the end of the deposit term.

main.title: web 3.0 Interest accounts up to 10.7% apy

array.description: Enjoy the freedom to deposit and withdraw anytime
USDT and USDC interest accounts available

simple_steps.title: get started in 3 simple steps
simple_steps.description: It only takes a few minutes

array.title: sign up
array.description: Go to defi.choise.com/earn and choose the interest account type

array.title: deposit
array.description: Enter the amount you are willing to deposit and the period
